mapper.select: SELECT hall_id, h_name, miniHall, addr, url, seat FROM aas.tb_hall ORDER BY h_name

SELECT a.hall_id, a.h_name, a.miniHall, a.seat, b.h_day, b.hallPay_id FROM aas.tb_hall a INNER JOIN aas.tb_hallpay b ON a.hall_id = b.hall_id WHERE a.hall_id LIKE CONCAT(SUBSTRING(#{hall_id}, 1, CHAR_LENGTH(#{hall_id}) - 3), '-%')

SELECT o.hall_id, o.user_id, o.start_date, o.end_date, o.price, o.pay_date, h.miniHall, o.pay_status FROM aas.tb_hallOrder o JOIN aas.tb_hall h ON o.hall_id = h.hall_id ORDER BY o.pay_date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT o.hall_id, o.user_id, o.start_date, o.end_date, o.price, o.pay_date, h.miniHall, o.pay_status FROM aas.tb_hallOrder o JOIN aas.tb_hall h ON o.hall_id = h.hall_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY o.pay_date DESC LIMIT 1
